sentences.en: A lot of skyscrapers in Manhattan are rising up to the skies.
sentences.cn: 曼哈顿有许多摩天大楼耸入云霄.

sentences.en: But before you can even pay the tuition, you have to get in. Competition for a spot at some of Manhattan's most coveted schools is fierce.
sentences.cn: 然而即使你能付得起学费，你必须要先入园才行。在曼哈顿区一些最抢手的学校里，争夺一个名额的竞争是非常激烈的。

sentences.en: Chicago is often spared ; we aren't as iconic as Manhattan.
Do you need your flat in Manhattan?
sentences.cn: 你需要你在曼哈顿的公寓吗？

sentences.en: From the plane we had a bird's eye view of Manhattan.
sentences.cn: 从飞机上我们可以鸟瞰曼哈顿.

sentences.en: He trailed through the wet Manhattan streets.
sentences.cn: 他没精打采地走过曼哈顿湿漉漉的街道。

sentences.en: He's living in a converted loft in lower Manhattan.
sentences.cn: 他住在下曼哈顿的一间改建的阁楼里.

sentences.en: Hell, why not buy all of Manhattan?
sentences.cn: 见鬼，为什么不把曼哈顿全买下来？

sentences.en: I'll hate leaving Manhattan and missing certain ballets and concerts.
sentences.cn: 但我讨厌离开曼哈顿还有错过那些芭蕾剧和音乐会.

sentences.en: Of all the restaurants in Manhattan, why take Libby to Fung Wa?
sentences.cn: 曼哈顿那么多餐厅你为何要带莉比去风华餐厅?

sentences.en: So I decided to move out, and got my own place Manhattan.
sentences.cn: 所以我决定搬出去, 并且在曼哈顿找了个地方.

sentences.en: The desired effect is to place bookmarks on a map of Manhattan, one bookmark per property with apartment listings.
sentences.cn: 预期的效果是在曼哈顿区的地图上放置书签，公寓列表的每处房产对应一个书签。

sentences.en: The local neighbourhood, like so many areas of Manhattan, is gradually being gentrified.
sentences.cn: 同曼哈顿的许多地区一样，当地街区正逐渐贵族化。

sentences.en: The mayor's scheme offers incentives to firms setting up in lower Manhattan.
sentences.cn: 市长的方案激励了打算在曼哈顿下城开业的公司。

sentences.en: The others are the Bronx, Brooklyn, Manhattan and Queens.
sentences.cn: 布朗克斯区, 布鲁克林区, 曼哈顿区和皇后区.

sentences.en: They bought all their equipment from a defunct brewery in Manhattan.
sentences.cn: 他们那些设备都是从曼哈顿一家已经关闭的啤酒厂购买的。

sentences.en: This is the seventh year that he has worked the streets of Manhattan.
sentences.cn: 这是他在曼哈顿街头献艺的第7个年头。

sentences.en: What's a hospice nurse from Manhattan doing at a high school homecoming in Texas?
sentences.cn: 曼哈顿的临终关怀护士到德克萨斯州的一所高中返校节来干 什么 ?

phrases.tran_cn: 曼哈顿闹市区（纽约市中心商业地带）
曼哈顿计划（第二次世界大战期间美国陆军自1942年起开发核武器计划的代号）

trans.tran_cn: 曼哈顿岛；曼哈顿区（纽约市中心）
